医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
寄养残疾儿童面临更大的风险寄养中的残疾儿童极其脆弱，面临着虐待和被赶出家门的风险，并且更加需要医疗服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Children-with-disability-in-foster-care-face-increased-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Children-with-disability-in-foster-care-face-increased-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3ad2eeee-e212-4f10-a9f2-c6ee994f284d Fri, 27 Sep 2024 08:02:38 -0400 Children with disabilities in foster care face increased risks
为什么糖尿病患者低血糖引起的胰高血糖素分泌受损研究结果表明，过量的生长抑素会抑制 1 型糖尿病患者的胰高血糖素分泌，为低血糖管理策略提供了一个新的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Why-hypoglycemia-induced-glucagon-secretion-becomes-impaired-in-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Why-hypoglycemia-induced-glucagon-secretion-becomes-impaired-in-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3a006a8-5e94-48b8-b0ad-91d89bb5231a Fri, 27 Sep 2024 07:57:00 -0400 Why hypoglycemia-induced glucagon secretion becomes impaired in diabetes
纯母乳喂养可降低婴儿哮喘风险根据在奥兰多举行的美国儿科学会 2024 年全国会议暨展览会上发表的研究，出生时住院期间纯母乳喂养的婴儿在幼儿期患哮喘的可能性降低 22%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Exclusive-breastfeeding-linked-to-lower-asthma-risk-in-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Exclusive-breastfeeding-linked-to-lower-asthma-risk-in-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a156210-c656-438e-9daa-4a5dbbdd6dd1 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 07:55:54 -0400 Exclusive breastfeeding linked to lower asthma risk in infants
民主党候选人指责共和党现任议员在国会有反堕胎记录在本月的竞选广告中，来自加利福尼亚州奥兰治县的民主党人德里克·特兰（Derek Tran）抨击他的对手、美国共和党众议员米歇尔·斯蒂尔（Michelle Steel）支持全国堕胎禁令并投票限制生育控制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Democratic-hopefuls-fault-GOP-incumbents-for-anti-abortion-records-in-Congress.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Democratic-hopefuls-fault-GOP-incumbents-for-anti-abortion-records-in-Congress.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb59b7bc-0233-4bef-b72f-e2dd62f45ac7 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 07:33:53 -0400 Democratic hopefuls fault GOP incumbents for anti-abortion records in Congress
一些乡村小镇逆势兴建新医院怀俄明州派恩代尔这座拥有约 2,000 人的小镇依偎着风河山脉，这里正在举行一项新的早晨仪式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/A-few-rural-towns-are-bucking-the-trend-and-building-new-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/A-few-rural-towns-are-bucking-the-trend-and-building-new-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31b21881-103d-41e0-b6e4-992d2abaaf5c Fri, 27 Sep 2024 07:30:59 -0400 A few rural towns are bucking the trend and building new hospitals
为期 12 周的咖啡化合物研究显示，对于高危人群来说，其减肥和减脂效果良好研究表明，咖啡醇可能有助于减轻体重和内脏脂肪，但其对胰岛素敏感性和葡萄糖耐量的影响仍然有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/12-week-coffee-compound-study-shows-promising-results-for-weight-and-fat-reduction-in-at-risk-individuals。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/12-week-coffee-compound-study-shows-promising-results-for-weight-and-fat-reduction-in-at-risk-individuals。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=06db0c08-fe60-438e-8587-119ea0985437 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 05:51:00 -0400 12-week coffee compound study shows promising results for weight and fat reduction in at-risk individuals
数字游戏有望改善青少年多动症和抑郁症，但焦虑仍然是一个挑战一项荟萃分析表明，游戏化的数字心理健康干预措施可以有效减少青少年的抑郁症和多动症，强调治疗的参与度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Digital-games-show-promise-for-improving-ADHD-and-depression-in-youth-but-anxiety-remains-a-challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Digital-games-show-promise-for-improving-ADHD-and-depression-in-youth-but-anxiety-remains-a-challenge.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d48efc61-c532-4222-af8a-a42fff6e7206 Fri, 27 Sep 2024 05:29:00 -0400 Digital games show promise for improving ADHD and depression in youth, but anxiety remains a challenge
肝受体突变与肝功能障碍、胆固醇积累和肝炎有关破坏性的 LXRα 变异与肝脏胆固醇积聚和肝炎有关，强调了该受体在胆固醇感应和肝功能中的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Liver-receptor-mutations-linked-to-liver-dysfunction-cholesterol-accumulation-and-hepatitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Liver-receptor-mutations-linked-to-liver-dysfunction-cholesterol-accumulation-and-hepatitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a57ce9b9-33c2-4de2-8a21-690f51358f9b Fri, 27 Sep 2024 04:49:00 -0400 Liver receptor mutations linked to liver dysfunction, cholesterol accumulation, and hepatitis
TxGNN 通过预测尚未获得批准的疗法的罕见疾病的治疗方法来改善药物的再利用新模型 TxGNN 通过预测未知疗法的疾病治疗方法，彻底改变了零次药物再利用，通过可解释的人工智能解释提供更高的准确性和信任度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/TxGNN-improves-drug-repurifying-by-predicting-treatments-for-rare-diseases-with-no-approved-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/TxGNN-improves-drug-repurifying-by-predicting-treatments-for-rare-diseases-with-no-approved-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb818ce4-f385-4680-b154-f4f31c163d0d Fri, 27 Sep 2024 00:12:00 -0400 TxGNN improves drug repurposing by predicting treatments for rare diseases with no approved therapies
研究人员创造出高性能、环保的防晒霜研究人员利用木质素（一种天然丰富的聚合物）和二氧化钛（TiO2）开发出一种新型防晒霜，这是化妆品行业的一项重大突破。由Yarong Li和Zhiguang Tang领导的这项研究发表在《生物资源与生物产品杂志》上，详细介绍了双改性木质素亚微球的创新用途，以增强防晒霜的SPF值并改善防晒霜的颜色。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Researchers-create-high-performing-eco-friend-sunscreen.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240927/Researchers-create-high-performing-eco-friend-sunscreen.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=497add82-7233-4c8a-b715-f9cf355b9a9b Fri, 27 Sep 2024 00:01:40 -0400 Researchers create high-performing, eco-friendly sunscreen
